detail_desc: Wide, cotton jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the back and ribbing around the neckline. Relaxed fit.
Short skirt in imitation patent leather with a visible zip at the back. Soft brushed inside.

Straight-cut coat in imitation suede with no fasteners and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Patch front pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
